org.softsmithy.lib.util.concurrent

Class ThreadLocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ThreadLocal<T>
      • java.lang.InheritableThreadLocal<Map<String,Object>>
        • org.softsmithy.lib.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalStorage

  • public final class ThreadLocalStorage
extends InheritableThreadLocal<Map<String,Object>>
    A ThreadLocal which manages generic properties.
